title: Fossil fuels are doomed — and Trump can’t save them
description: Despite Trump's efforts to revive fossil fuels, the global shift to clean energy is unstoppable. With record heatwaves and natural disasters, countries are investing in renewables. COP31 in Turkey is expected to solidify a global roadmap away from fossil fuels.

title: What did the Harappans eat? Bengaluru-based collective launches video series on food habits, history of ancient Indians
description: The first two videos released on the collective's YouTube channel, Historically Tempered, deal with the diet of the Harappans and early Indians in general, featuring speakers such as archaeologists Jaya Menon and Supriya Varma, and historian Romila Thapar.

title: Sirpur Heritage Festival 2026 To Celebrate Ancient Buddhist Legacy
description: (MENAFN - AsiaNet News) The Sirpur Heritage Festival 2026 is all set to take place from February 1 to 3, 2026, in line with the celebrations of Maghi Purnima. Organised jointly by the District ...
